analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: do not falsely project because of the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: They do not falsely project with respect to the knowledge of all aspects, thinking, ‘The knowledge of all aspects is mine.’

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na /🔽de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na / de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: They do not falsely project with respect to the knowledge of all aspects.🔽“They do not falsely project with respect to dreams,

original: rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: they do not falsely project with respect to dreams because of them,

original: rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: they do not falsely project with the thought ‘dreams are mine,’

original: rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do //
analyzed: rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do //
translated: and they do not falsely project with respect to dreams.🔽“They do not falsely project with respect to illusions,

original: de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed /🔽sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed / sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: they do not falsely project with respect to illusions because of them,

original: sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: they do not falsely project with the thought ‘illusions are mine,’

original: sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do //🔽de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do // de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: and they do not falsely project with respect to illusions.🔽“They do not falsely project with respect to mirages,

original: smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: they do not falsely project with respect to mirages because of them,

original: smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed /🔽smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do; ;de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed / smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do; ;de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: they do not falsely project with the thought ‘mirages are mine,’🔽and they do not falsely project with respect to mirages.🔽“They do not falsely project with respect to echoes,

original: sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: they do not falsely project with respect to echoes because of them,

original: sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: they do not falsely project with the thought ‘echoes are mine,’

original: sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do //🔽de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do // de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: They do not falsely project about echoes.🔽They do not falsely project about optical aberrations.

original: mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: They do not falsely project about optical aberrations.

original: mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: They do not falsely project, ‘Optical aberrations are mine.’

original: mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do //🔽de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do // de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: They do not falsely project about optical aberrations.🔽They do not falsely project about cities of gandharvas.

original: dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: They do not falsely project about cities of gandharvas.

original: dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: They do not falsely project, ‘Cities of gandharvas are mine.’

original: dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do //🔽de sprul pa rlom @395b sems su mi byed /
analyzed: dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do // de sprul pa rlom @395b sems su mi byed /
translated: They do not falsely project about cities of gandharvas.🔽They do not falsely project about magical incarnations.

original: sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed //
analyzed: sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed //
translated: They do not falsely project about magical incarnations.

original: sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: They do not falsely project, ‘Magical incarnations are mine.’

original: sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do ////
analyzed: sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do ////
translated: They do not falsely project about magical incarnations.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /🔽bam po brgya go drug pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa / bam po brgya go drug pa /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus /
analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus /
translated: Then, through the Buddha’s power,

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na /🔽rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mche ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mche ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang /
translated: In this great trichiliocosm,🔽there are the gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm, the gods of the Trayas­triṃśa realm, the gods of the Yāma realm, the gods of the Tuṣita realm, the gods of the Nirmāṇa­rata realm, the gods of the Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin realm, the gods of the Brahmakāyika realm, the gods of the Brahmapurohita realm,

original: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang /
analyzed: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang /
translated: the gods of the Brahmapārṣadya realm, the gods of the Mahā­brahmāṇa realm, the gods of the Ābhāsvara realm, the gods of the Parīttābha realm, the gods of the Apramāṇābha realm, the gods of the Ābhāsvara realm, the gods of the Śubhakṛtsna realm, the gods of the Parīttaśubha realm,

original: tshad med dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad med che ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / mi che ba'i lha dang / mi gdung ba'i lha dang /
analyzed: tshad med dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad med che ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / mi che ba'i lha dang / mi gdung ba'i lha dang /
translated: the gods of Immeasurable Virtue, the gods of Flourishing Virtue, the gods of Great Virtue, the gods of Minor Virtue, the gods of Immeasurable Great Virtue, the gods of Great Result, the gods of No Greatness, the gods of No Torment,

original: shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og min gyi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis /🔽lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas /
analyzed: shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og min gyi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis / lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas /
translated: the gods of Excellent Vision, the gods of Manifesting Excellence, and the gods of Unsurpassed Heaven, all of them

original: bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor zhing /🔽bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dang ste lhags nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dang ste lhags nas /
translated: sprinkled the Blessed One with divine sandalwood powder.🔽They then approached the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te /

original: phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
analyzed: phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
translated: and sat to one side.

original: de nas rgyal po chen @396a *//
analyzed: de nas rgyal po chen @396a *//
translated: Then the great king

original: po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthus /
analyzed: po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthus /
translated: and the lord of the gods Śakra, and Brahmā, lord of the Sahā world, and the gods of the Ābhāsvara realm, and the gods of the Śubhakṛtsna realm, and the gods of the Bṛhatphala realm, and the gods of the Śuddhāvāsa realm, through the Buddha’s might

original: shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa /
analyzed: shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa /
translated: saw a thousand buddhas in the eastern direction teaching the Dharma with precisely these letters,

analyzed: mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba / dge slong rang 'byor zhes bya ba sha stag gis /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas /🔽gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas / gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the highest, complete enlightenment of perfect buddhahood,🔽he will not teach the doctrine that physical forms are permanent or that they are impermanent.

original: gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the doctrine that physical forms are imbued with happiness or that they are imbued with suffering.

original: gzugs bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Form is a self’ or ‘Form is not a self.’

original: gzugs sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Form is attractive’ or ‘Form is unattractive.’

original: gzugs zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Form is calm’ or ‘Form is not calm.’

original: gzugs bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Form is bound’ or ‘Form is liberated.’

original: gzugs 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Form is past.’

original: gzugs ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Form is future.’

original: gzugs da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Form is present.’

original: tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Sensation is permanent’ or ‘Sensation is impermanent.’

original: tshor ba bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshor ba bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Sensation is happiness’ or ‘Sensation is suffering.’

original: tshor ba bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston @398b par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshor ba bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston @398b par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are a self or that they are not a self.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are happy or that they are not happy.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are a disease or that they are not a disease.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are an abscess or that they are not an abscess.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are an affliction or that they are not an affliction.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are impermanent or that they are permanent.

original: tshor ba sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //🔽tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshor ba sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro // tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are painful or that they are not painful.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are a self or that they are not a self.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are empty or that they are not empty.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are with signs or that they are signless.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are having aspirations or that they are without aspirations.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are calm or that they are not calm.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are void or that they are not void.

original: tshor ba bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshor ba bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are afflicted or that they are purified.

original: tshor ba 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //🔽tshor ba ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshor ba 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro // tshor ba ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the doctrine that feelings arise or that they are extinguished.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are appropriated or that they are non-appropriated.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are produced or that they are unproduced.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are compounded or that they are uncompounded.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are to be examined or that they are not to be examined.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are to be developed or that they are not to be developed.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are to be actualized or that they are not to be actualized.

original: tshor ba da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshor ba da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are past, future, or present.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are internal or that they are external.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are to be abandoned or that they are not to be abandoned.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are to be realized or that they are not to be realized.

original: 'du shes rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du shes rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the doctrine that feelings are to be cultivated or that they are not to be cultivated.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that feelings

original: 'du shes bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro; ;'du shes bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du shes bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro; ;'du shes bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Feeling is healthy,’ or ‘Feeling is unhealthy.’🔽He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Feeling is the noose of Māra,’ or ‘Feeling is the escape from the noose of Māra.’🔽He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Feeling is in cyclic existence,’ or ‘Feeling is beyond cyclic existence.’

original: 'du shes sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du shes sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Feeling is with afflictions,’ or ‘Feeling is without afflictions.’

original: 'du shes zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'du shes bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du shes zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro // 'du shes bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Feeling is with purification,’ or ‘Feeling is without purification.’🔽He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Feeling is with grasping,’ or ‘Feeling is without grasping.’🔽He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Feeling is with liberation,’ or ‘Feeling is not with liberation.’

original: 'du shes 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du shes 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Feeling is with bondage,’ or ‘Feeling is with freedom.’

original: 'du shes ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'du shes da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du shes ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro // 'du shes da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Feeling is past,’ or ‘Feeling is future,’ or ‘Feeling is present.’

original: 'du byed rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du byed rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Perceptions are permanent’ or ‘Perceptions are impermanent.’

original: 'du byed bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du byed bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Form is happy’ or ‘Form is suffering.’

original: 'du byed bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston @399a *//🔽par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du byed bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston @399a *// par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Form is a self’ or ‘Form is not a self.’🔽He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Form is beautiful’ or ‘Form is not beautiful.’🔽He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Form is empty’ or ‘Form is not empty.’

original: 'du byed sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du byed sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Form is with afflictions’ or ‘Form is without afflictions.’🔽He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Form is to be pacified’ or ‘Form is not to be pacified.’🔽He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Form is to be abandoned’ or ‘Form is not to be abandoned.’

original: 'du byed zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro; ;'du byed bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du byed zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro; ;'du byed bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //

original: 'du byed 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du byed 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Form is past,’

original: 'du byed ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du byed ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Form is future,’

original: 'du byed da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du byed da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Form is present.’

original: rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not teach the Dharma saying, ‘Consciousness is permanent’ or ‘Consciousness is impermanent.’

analyzed: rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rnam par shes pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rna ba sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro // rna ba zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //

translated: He will not teach the doctrine that the superknowledges are past, future, or present.🔽He will not teach the doctrine that the meditative stabilities are entities or non-entities.

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //

translated: Great compassion does not teach the doctrine that it is calm or that it is not calm.🔽Great compassion does not teach the doctrine that it is empty or that it is not empty.🔽Great compassion does not teach the doctrine that it is with signs or that it is signless.🔽Great compassion does not teach the doctrine that it is with wishes or that it is wishless.🔽Great compassion does not teach the doctrine that it is compounded or that it is uncompounded.🔽Great compassion does not teach the doctrine that it is appropriated or that it is unappropriated.🔽Great compassion does not teach the doctrine that it is the past, the future, or the present.

translated: He does not teach the Dharma saying that the eighteen distinct attributes of a Buddha are calm or not calm.🔽He does not teach the Dharma saying that the eighteen distinct attributes of a Buddha are empty or not empty.🔽He does not teach the Dharma saying that the eighteen distinct attributes of a Buddha are with signs or signless.🔽He does not teach the Dharma saying that the eighteen distinct attributes of a Buddha are having aspirations or lacking aspirations.🔽He does not teach the Dharma saying that the eighteen distinct attributes of a Buddha are calm or not calm.🔽He does not teach the Dharma saying that the eighteen distinct attributes of a Buddha are void or not void.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not teach the Dharma saying that the eighteen distinct attributes of a Buddha are afflicted or purified.🔽He does not teach the Dharma saying that the eighteen distinct attributes of a Buddha are generated or extinguished.🔽He does not teach the Dharma saying that the eighteen distinct attributes of a Buddha are taken up or laid down.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not teach the Dharma saying that the eighteen distinct attributes of a Buddha are past, future, or present.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not teach the doctrine saying, ‘The eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are future.’

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not teach the doctrine saying, ‘The eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are present.’

original: thams cad shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not teach the doctrine saying, ‘The knowledge of all aspects is permanent’ or ‘The knowledge of all aspects is impermanent.’

original: thams cad shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not teach the doctrine saying, ‘The knowledge of all aspects is happiness’ or ‘The knowledge of all aspects is suffering.’

original: thams cad shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces @429b bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces @429b bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not teach the doctrine saying, ‘The knowledge of all aspects is a self’ or ‘The knowledge of all aspects is not a self.’

original: thams cad shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //

original: thams cad shes pa nyid bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //🔽thams cad shes pa nyid 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //

original: thams cad shes pa nyid ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //

original: thams cad shes pa nyid da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos @430b ni ji ltar ston par 'gyur /
translated: Subhūti then asked, “Blessed One, when the bodhisattva great being Maitreya has fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, how will he teach the Dharma?

analyzed: ston na ci zhig ston par 'gyur / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: 'du shes shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro //

translated: “Sound is extremely pure” is how

translated: The Blessed One said, “Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
translated: because form is pure,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is pure.
